Posts.Content: csifinski wrote: I had a bilat on 7/3 and then ended up with an infection on my right side 5 weeks later,  and after massive dosages of antibiotics that did not clear up the infection, my PS removed the tissue expander on Monday 8/18. (and have a drain again!!!!)  I am still on anitbiotics and still running a low grade fever....Has anyone dealt with this and when can I expect this to be over....this has been very exhausting and now my my reconstruction will be delayed until my body completely heals..PS said 3 to 6 months. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Removal of Tissue Expander due to Infection csifinski Kinclan
